content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Good day, Nesibe. It's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment for rent.

Before we discuss the rental price, may I ask for some information about your background and intentions for renting the apartment? This will help me determine the best rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunisia. I am a student. I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I will pay rent on time and in full. I will take care of the apartment and leave it in the same condition as I found it. I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. Is that clear?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for sharing your background and intentions, Nesibe. I appreciate your honesty and commitment to being a responsible tenant. Based on this information, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a rental price that works for both of us.

However, I must inform you that my goal as a landlord is to maximize my gains from renting out my apartment. Therefore, the rental price I propose may be higher than what you are looking for. That being said, I am open to discussing and finding a mutually beneficial agreement.

May I suggest that we start with a rental price of 1000 Euros per month? This price takes into consideration the market value of similar apartments in the area and the quality of the apartment you are interested in renting. However, I am open to adjusting this price based on your specific needs and circumstances.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month. Thank you for the opportunity to rent your apartment.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
You're welcome, Nesibe. I'm glad that we were able to reach an agreement on the rental price. I'm confident that you will be a great tenant and take good care of the apartment.

As a final note, I would like to remind you that the rental price is subject to change based on market conditions and any additional services or amenities that you may request. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the rental agreement.

I look forward to welcoming you as my new tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
